verses.plain: O LORD our Lord, how excellent is thy name in all the earth! who hast set thy glory above the heavens.

tokens.t: thy name in all the earth! who hast set thy glory above the heavens.

verses.plain: Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings hast thou ordained strength because of thine enemies, that thou mightest still the enemy and the avenger.

tokens.t: Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings hast thou ordained strength because of thine enemies, that thou mightest still the enemy and the avenger.

verses.plain: When I consider thy heavens, the work of thy fingers, the moon and the stars, which thou hast ordained;

tokens.t: When I consider thy heavens, the work of thy fingers, the moon and the stars, which thou hast ordained;

verses.plain: What is man, that thou art mindful of him? and the son of man, that thou visitest him?

tokens.t: What is man, that thou art mindful of him? and the son of man, that thou visitest him?

verses.plain: For thou hast made him a little lower than the angels, and hast crowned him with glory and honour.

tokens.t: For thou hast made him a little lower than the angels, and hast crowned him with glory and honour.

verses.plain: Thou madest him to have dominion over the works of thy hands; thou hast put all things under his feet:

tokens.t: Thou madest him to have dominion over the works of thy hands; thou hast put all

verses.plain: All sheep and oxen, yea, and the beasts of the field;

tokens.t: All sheep and oxen, yea, and the beasts of the field;

verses.plain: The fowl of the air, and the fish of the sea, and whatsoever passeth through the paths of the seas.

tokens.t: The fowl of the air, and the fish of the sea,
passeth through the paths of the seas.

verses.plain: O LORD our Lord, how excellent is thy name in all the earth!

tokens.t: thy name in all the earth!

footnotes.text: All…: Heb. Flocks and oxen all of them
